short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Organize your tabs and reduce clutter.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:
- Store tabs to reduce clutter and save memory
- Create custom groups to manage your tabs.
- Share entire groups or selected tabs
- Browse and search your tabs

Privacy and Security:
Your data is sacred! That's why WorkSpot does not collect or transmit any of your personal information.

Add the extension today and take the first step towards a better browsing experience!
